attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-LOZ6imLOS9cCA25oKft_desc
attribs.current: As a bonus action, the orc can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-LOZ6qDD83ocrT8dO21h_desc
attribs.current: The orc deals an extra 4 (1d8) necrotic damage when it hits with a weapon attack (included in the attack).

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-LOZ6ti-vk9lsVdyV7xD_desc
attribs.current:
The orc is a 5th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (save DC 12, +4 to hit with spell attacks). The orc has the following cleric spells prepared:
Cantrips (at will): resistance, spare the dying, thaumaturgy
1st level (4 slots): bane, inflict wounds
2nd level (3 slots): blindness/deafness, silence
3rd level (2 slots): animate dead, spirit guardians

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction-l_-LOZ7HZ5zoWYK6C7SnQ6_description
attribs.current: The orc chooses one undead creature it controls. That creature can immediately use its reaction to make one weapon attack.

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction-l_-LOZ7NBH7YjHWeg8BZeg_description
attribs.current: Up to six undead creatures that the orc can see within 60 feet of it regain 4 (1d4 + 2) hit points.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-LOZ7abBezjYCpIyrcHQ_spelldescription
attribs.current: You touch one willing creature. Once before the spell ends, the target can roll a d4 and add the number rolled to one saving throw of its choice. It can roll the die before or after making the saving throw. The spell then ends.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-LOZ7d3kGhajdJQmSUfc_spelltarget
attribs.current: A living creature that has 0 hit points

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-LOZ7d3kGhajdJQmSUfc_spelldescription
attribs.current: You touch a living creature that has 0 hit points. The creature becomes stable. This spell has no effect on undead or constructs.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-LOZ7eebmWZHQQNEsUFr_spelldescription
attribs.current: You manifest a minor wonder, a sign of supernatural power, within range. You create one of the following magical effects within range: Your voice booms up to three times as loud as normal for 1 minute. You cause flames to flicker, brighten, dim, or change color for 1 minute. You cause harmless tremors in the ground for 1 minute. You create an instantaneous sound that originates from a point of your choice within range, such as a rumble of thunder, the cry of a raven, or ominous whispers. You instantaneously cause an unlocked door or window to fly open or slam shut. You alter the appearance of your eyes for 1 minute. If you cast this spell multiple times, you can have up to three of its 1-minute effects active at a time, and you can dismiss such an effect as an action.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LOZ7g4nvXZSssThdtzt_spelltarget
attribs.current: Up to three creatures of your choice that you can see within range

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LOZ7g4nvXZSssThdtzt_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 1st.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LOZ7g4nvXZSssThdtzt_spelldescription
attribs.current: Up to three creatures of your choice that you can see within range must make Charisma saving throws. Whenever a target that fails this saving throw makes an attack roll or a saving throw before the spell ends, the target must roll a d4 and subtract the number rolled from the attack roll or saving throw.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LOZ7hgv7zgOuCqvLFId_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by 1d10 for each slot level above 1st.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LOZ7hgv7zgOuCqvLFId_spelldescription
attribs.current: Make a melee spell attack against a creature you can reach. On a hit, the target takes 3d10 necrotic damage.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-2_-LOZ7jrU3r0cQToT8mJS_spelltarget
attribs.current: One creature that you can see within range

attribs.name: repeating_spell-2_-LOZ7jrU3r0cQToT8mJS_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 2nd.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-2_-LOZ7jrU3r0cQToT8mJS_spelldescription
attribs.current: You can blind or deafen a foe. Choose one creature that you can see within range to make a Constitution saving throw. If it fails, the target is either blinded or deafened (your choice) for the duration. At the end of each of its turns, the target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the spell ends.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-2_-LOZ7lvRCXGFPMMDWgES_spelltarget
attribs.current: 20-foot-radius sphere centered on a point you choose within range

attribs.name: repeating_spell-2_-LOZ7lvRCXGFPMMDWgES_spelldescription
attribs.current: For the duration, no sound can be created within or pass through a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on a point you choose within range. Any creature or object entirely inside the sphere is immune to thunder damage, and creatures are deafened while entirely inside it. Casting a spell that includes a verbal component is impossible there.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-3_-LOZ7nTgawbjZhZp5qGx_spelltarget
attribs.current: A pile of bones or a corpse of a Medium or Small humanoid within range

attribs.name: repeating_spell-3_-LOZ7nTgawbjZhZp5qGx_spellcomp_materials
attribs.current: A drop of blood, a piece of flesh, and a pinch of bone dust

attribs.name: repeating_spell-3_-LOZ7nTgawbjZhZp5qGx_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, you animate or reassert control over two additional Undead creatures for each slot level above 3rd. Each of the creatures must come from a different corpse or pile of bones.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-3_-LOZ7nTgawbjZhZp5qGx_spelldescription
attribs.current: This spell creates an undead servant. Choose a pile of bones or a corpse of a Medium or Small humanoid within range. Your spell imbues the target with a foul mimicry of life, raising it as an undead creature. The target becomes a skeleton if you chose bones or a zombie if you chose a corpse (the DM has the creature’s game statistics). On each of your turns, you can use a bonus action to mentally command any creature you made with this spell if the creature is within 60 feet of you (if you control multiple creatures, you can command any or all of them at the same time, issuing the same command to each one). You decide what action the creature will take and where it will move during its next turn, or you can issue a general command, such as to guard a particular chamber or corridor. If you issue no commands, the creature only defends itself against hostile creatures. Once given an order, the creature continues to follow it until its task is complete. The creature is under your control for 24 hours, after which it stops obeying any command you’ve given it. To maintain control of the creature for another 24 hours, you must cast this spell on the creature again before the current 24-hour period ends. This use of the spell reasserts your control over up to four creatures you have animated with this spell, rather than animating a new one.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-3_-LOZ7pUJvfVZEOKClktm_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the damage increases by 1d8 for each slot level above 3rd.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-3_-LOZ7pUJvfVZEOKClktm_spelldescription
attribs.current: You call forth spirits to protect you. They flit around you to a distance of 15 feet for the duration. If you are good or neutral, their spectral form appears angelic or fey (your choice). If you are evil, they appear fiendish. When you cast this spell, you can designate any number of creatures you can see to be unaffected by it. An affected creature’s speed is halved in the area, and when the creature enters the area for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there, it must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 3d8 radiant damage (if you are good or neutral) or 3d8 necrotic damage (if you are evil). On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage.
